thread.title: Daniel Craig & David Oyelowo Will Do 'Othello' Off-Broadway!
thread.title_full: Daniel Craig & David Oyelowo Will Do 'Othello' Off-Broadway! - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Daniel Craig & David Oyelowo Will Do 'Othello' Off-Broadway!
text: Daniel Craig and David Oyelowo are set to team up together for a new Off-Broadway production of the classic Shakespeare play Othello. The play will be produced at the New York Theatre Workshop and more casting will be announced at a later date. “This production is an opportunity for New York Theatre Workshop to do [...] »
